title: Massive lag issues
body:
Hi, I'm having massive lag issues that only effect league of legends. My ping is a very stable 87 and my fps is a very stable 60.

Some games my connection is fine and other games It's unplayable and I have had to leave ranked games where we were winning multiple times.

I would strongly appreciate any help though I doubt anyone can. But what choice do I have.

replies.body:
Update. I ran netalyser and this is my results. unfortunately I have no idea what this means.

http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=43ca253f-28475-9eedf6c4-8a49-4e67-9309#latency
That seems like you're using an abnormal DNS. Are you currently on your default DNS? Do you know what DNS means?
Domain name system. I slept through my IT classes and somehow managed to push enough words together to pass. But I've forgot how DNS might effect this.

Oh, I was fairly confident that it was Domain Name Server. But that doesn't matter so much, as what it does is retrieve the names of objects which you get over the internet. If you have a bad DNS, then you'll fail to download some things, which would be causing your irregular drop outs in connection.

[Here are Riot's official instructions on how to use another DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4). It will switch you over to Google's Public DNS, which has a relatively good reputation. Be sure to remember your old settings, though.
